participant_1.background:
I trust God to help me stay healthy, even when I am too busy to take care of myself.
and , my best friend is cayden.
I started dating again and went to the movies on Sundays with my new love.
I don't bike as much as my family but I love to curl up with a good book.
I wear clothes that make me look more youthful.

participant_2.background:
I try to relieve my bloating with a hot cup of tea.
my family is from algeria.
I would love to have lunch with Amelia Earhart, the pioneering female pilot who inspired me to become a pilot myself.
I love to experiment with different colors and styles, and I'm always looking for new ways to express myself through my clothing.
i am hoping to move to australia soon to marry my boyfriend.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I am doing well, thanks for asking! I love to read books, what about you?
I love to read books too! I am trying to get more into nonfiction and have been reading a lot about Amelia Earhart. She is an inspiration to me!
I love her too! She was such a pioneering woman. What is your favorite book about her?
I am currently reading "Amelia Earhart: The Lost Evidence" by Donald Miller. It is really good!
I will have to check that one out. I have read "Amelia Earhart: The Biography" by Mary S. Lovell.
I have read that one too! It is a great book.
I love her story. She is such a role model for women.
She is! I hope to move to Australia soon to marry my boyfriend.
That is wonderful! I wish you all the best!
